title: Strawberry and vanilla chia seed dessert
ingredients: ['235ml unsweetened almond milk', '250g 0% fat vanilla yogurt', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'pinch of salt', '30g chia seeds', 'To serve', '350g strawberries, sliced', '4 teaspoons maple syrup', '35g sliced almonds, toasted']
